title: NutriVerde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: Tiny, charming bistro serving food that is 98% organic and all veg as of Dec 09. The daily lunch special for around 75 pesos includes a vegetarian soup, a main dish (vegetarian croquettes, sauteed vegetables with tofu), and organic brown rice (prepared as a risotto with celery or with vegetable), a fresh salad, and a juice drink (cactus, mint). There is also an extensive menu, a juice bar menu. Try the breakfast pancakes made from oats and flax seeds.
